ygData.subject: Posted a few new pics
ygData.msgSnippet: All for everyone s enjoyment.. Also, I have a sad tale to tell. One evening I was hunting wooly mammoths in Everfrost plains. I was doing nicely with
ygData.messageBody:
All for everyone's enjoyment.. <br><br>Also, I
have a sad tale to tell. One evening I was hunting
wooly mammoths in Everfrost plains. I was doing nicely
with one, until one of its buddies decided to help
out. So I ran, being the smart druid I am. I scraped
the mammoths off at Bandl McMarrin, he's such a great
guy. And I started to sit down to meditate near him.
Oops.. I hit the 'snare' button, and guess who my target
is.. So I run back across the EF plains to zone at
Permafrost. Normally the ice giants don't pay any attention
to me, but being the night before a Vox raid, they
were all upset over being hunted. One respawned right
as I ran by, and then he proceeded to decimate me
with dual 114 punches, a 25 bash and stun, and another
set of punches. Ouch. Too bad Bandl hadn't been there
for that fight.<br><br>Nukai Oakenwulf<br>Druid of
Spiritus Valorum<br>Tunare's Chosen of Karana
